Description: To start a datastream demo, it included: Kinesis Stream + Kinesis Firehouse + Redshift + EC2(with grafana installed)

KeyName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instance
KeyName.ConstraintDescription: must be the name of an existing EC2 KeyPair.

InstanceType.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid EC2 instance type.

IPRange.Description: The IP address range that can be open to public
IPRange.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

Fn::Join:
#!/bin/bash -v
yum update -y
yum -y install python-pip
pip install s4cmd
chmod +x /bin/s4cmd
yum -y install https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/grafana-releases/release/grafana-5.1.4-1.x86_64.rpm
service grafana-server start
grafana-cli plugins install grafana-piechart-panel
yum -y install postgresql

AZ.Description: Availability Zone of the newly created EC2 instance

InstanceId.Description: InstanceId of the newly created EC2 instance

PublicDNSIP.Description: Public DNS and IP for the Ec2
